summary: At the end of the Civil War, 2 Confederates holding stolen Union money and chased by Union troops separate, one escaping with the loot and the other getting a 5-year prison term.
cast: Thomas Hunter|Henry Silva|Dan Duryea|Nando Gazzolo|Nicoletta Machiavelli|Gianna Serra|Loris Loddi|Geoffrey Copleston|Sandro Dori|Guido Celano|Paolo Magalotti|Gianluigi Crescenzi|Tiberio Mitri|Fiorella Ferrero|Vittorio Bonos|Goffredo Matassi|Piero Morgia|John M. Gaskins|Lucio De Santis|Guglielmo Spoletini|Pietro Ceccarelli|Mirko Valentin|Mauro Mannatrizio|Luigi Scavran|Fortunato Arena|Jeff Cameron|Paolo Figlia|Renzo Pevarello|Goffredo Unger|Alberigo Donadeo|Osiride Pevarello
keywords: italo western|soldier|army|civil war|walking on a roof
director: Director: Carlo Lizzani (as Lee W. Beaver)
title: Un río de dólares
